library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(webshot)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "##")

}

## Twin Cities Buses

This app displays live locations of buses in the Minneapolis--Saint Paul Metro Transit system. It fetches data from a [live feed](http://svc.metrotransit.org/), and uses the [leaflet](http://rstudio.github.io/leaflet/) package to generate the map.

[Source code](https://github.com/rstudio/shinydashboard/tree/gh-pages/_apps/buses/)

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
appshot('_apps/buses/', 'images/buses.png',
  delay=3
) %>%
  resize('50%') %>%
  shrink()
```

[![Twin Citis Bus app](images/buses.png)](https://winston.shinyapps.io/buses/)
